```{r pancreas 31980352, include=FALSE}

PMID_31980352 <- RefManageR::ReadPubMed('31980352', database = 'PubMed')

citation_31980352 <- paste0(PMID_31980352$journal,' ', PMID_31980352$year, ' ', PMID_31980352$month,';', PMID_31980352$volume,'(', PMID_31980352$number,'):', PMID_31980352$pages)

PubMed_31980352 <- paste0(PubMedString, PMID_31980352$eprint)

doi_31980352 <- paste0(doiString, PMID_31980352$doi)

Sys.sleep(1)

```
